recommendation: Use DAP at sowing time for nitrogen and phosphorus. Apply vermicompost to improve soil structure and encourage root development.
Apply NPK 20:20:0 before sowing. Add organic manure like cow dung compost to boost early growth and drought resistance.
Use FYM (Farm Yard Manure) in planting pits. Apply Potash-rich fertilizer monthly to enhance fruit size and sweetness.
Before sowing, apply 60 kg NPK (12:32:16) per acre. Urea can be split into two doses for better tillering.
Incorporate 5 tons/acre of compost. Use NPK 12:32:16 during early stages and top-dress with urea at flowering.
Use 50 kg DAP per acre at sowing. Supplement with compost or vermicompost to improve nitrogen fixation.
Apply well-rotted compost at planting. Use NPK 10:26:26 every 30 days for better flowering and fruiting.
Apply 100 kg Urea and 50 kg DAP per acre. Ensure soil has enough calcium and boron to avoid head rot.
Use vermicompost or FYM before sowing. Apply Potash for better root size and to prevent cracking.
Apply SSP at sowing for phosphorus. Use neem cake as a natural pest repellent and soil enricher.
Apply DAP and Potash before transplanting. Supplement with foliar spray of micronutrients at flowering stage.
Apply 500 g Urea and 1 kg MOP per tree yearly, split into 2â€“3 doses. Use compost around root zone.
Apply compost before sowing. Use SSP and small quantity of Potash to enhance aroma and leaf quality.
Use DAP and NPK 20:20:0 at sowing. Add potash during flowering to increase boll formation and yield.
Apply 40 kg SSP per acre. Mix in compost or FYM for better seed quality and oil content.
Use 50 kg DAP and 2 tons FYM per acre. Vermicompost improves seed aroma and taste.
Apply 60:30:30 kg NPK per hectare. Add FYM or green manure before sowing to improve soil fertility.
Use 75 kg NPK and 2 tons compost per acre. Apply bio-fertilizers to improve bulb size and prevent fungal diseases.
Incorporate 10 tons FYM per acre. Use SSP and Potash monthly for better rhizome development and disease resistance.
Apply 50 kg DAP per acre. Avoid excess nitrogen. Use Rhizobium culture for nitrogen fixation.
Use 20 kg DAP per acre at sowing. Supplement with compost or neem cake for organic boost.
Use gypsum at pegging stage. Apply 25 kg urea and 75 kg SSP before sowing for oil-rich nuts.
Use compost or cow dung as basal manure. Add low dose of SSP to improve flowering and yield.
Apply 40 kg urea and 20 kg potash per acre. Use FYM or green manure for better drought resistance.
Apply 60 kg NPK and 2 tons FYM per acre. Top-dress with urea after 3 weeks of sowing.
Use 40 kg SSP and 2 tons FYM per acre. Avoid excess nitrogen to prevent excessive vegetative growth.
Apply 100 kg Urea, 60 kg SSP, and 40 kg MOP per acre. Split nitrogen into 3 doses.
Use 40 kg NPK and organic manure. Add zinc sulphate in zinc-deficient soils for improved growth.
Use compost and NPK before sowing. Potash improves sweetness and shelf life of fruits.
Apply 60 kg Urea and 20 kg Sulphur per acre. Use potash to increase oil content in seeds.
Use 100 kg Urea, 50 kg DAP, and potash per acre. Add FYM and micronutrients like Zinc and Boron.
Apply 100 kg Urea, 50 kg SSP, and 25 kg Zinc Sulphate per acre. Use green manure before transplanting.
Apply 50 kg DAP at sowing. Use Rhizobium culture to promote nodulation and nitrogen fixation.
Use compost before sowing. Apply NPK 10:26:26 to improve root shape and avoid splitting.
Apply 60 kg Urea and 30 kg SSP per acre. Organic compost improves grain quality and mineral content.
Apply 50 kg SSP and compost before sowing. Foliar spray of micronutrients improves oil content.
Use DAP and MOP at sowing. Add compost or neem cake to enhance drought tolerance.
Use 40 kg SSP and 2 tons FYM. Add Rhizobium culture and Potash during flowering stage.
Apply compost before sowing. Add Urea or Ammonium Sulphate for rapid green leafy growth.
Apply 150 kg Urea, 100 kg Potash, and compost per acre. Use press mud and biofertilizers for best results.
Apply 60 kg Urea, 40 kg SSP, and 20 kg Potash per acre. Add boron if leaf curling observed.
Use 80 kg Urea and 60 kg Potash per acre. Apply compost around tubers to improve size.
Use 75 kg NPK 10:26:26 and compost per acre. Add calcium and magnesium to prevent blossom end rot.
Incorporate 10 tons cow dung and apply SSP monthly. Use Trichoderma to prevent rhizome rot.
Use 50 kg DAP at sowing and compost. Rhizobium culture increases nitrogen supply.
Apply compost and 50 kg Potash. Foliar spray of Boron and Zinc improves fruit setting.
Use 100 kg Urea and 50 kg DAP per acre. Add sulphur and zinc if yellowing observed in leaves.
